DOC.brief_summary: Primecrolimus cream 1% is effective in the treatment of atopic dermatitis in African American children.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Pimecrolimus Treatment for Atopic Dermatitis of African American Children
DOC.criteria: African American children aged 2 to 17 years mild to moderate atopic dermatitis mEASI less than 3 at baseline allergy to Elidel or components use of oral steroids, immunosuppressive agents,cytostatics of phototherapy within 4 weeks prior to study. previous continuous or noncontinuous use of pimecrolimus or tacrolimus for greater than 11 months within 2 weeks of enrollment. active skin infections. immunocompromised patients. previous history of skin cancer or lymphoma any hypopigmentation in study areas pregnant or breastfeeding participation in another investigational trial
